channel.title: [PI] Yell command help

item.title: [PI] Yell command help
item.dc:creator: @harnas harnas
item.description:
@harnas wrote:

I tryd to add some new things in the yell command like super donator and etc.
But when I try this and make a player rights 4 and isdonator= 2, it still sayâ€™s before his name [Donator].
What am I doing wrong?

       }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
       }else if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.isDonator == 2){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Super donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

Read full topic
